episode_event_valentine_2026_ch0302_40_c:
Rika called [Name:PlayerNickname ],
asking to meet up to talk.

The meeting spot was a fancy restaurant,
the type of place that’d make anyone
nervous...

[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was waitin’
for ya!
Oh? What’s up? You look nervous!
Location got you on edge, huh?
Don’t worry—you’ve got ol’ Rika with ya.

If you’re wonderin’ what we’re doin’ in a
place like this, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
it’s ’cause I’ve got something for you.
Boom! A gift—just for you!
Some chocolates to show my appreciation!

Truth is, I actually got them custom-made
by Katy.

I told her all about you, and she whipped
’em up with you in mind!
You’ve always been so kind to me, so...

I thought I’d show my gratitude in the form
of sweets!
Thank you, Rika!
Nahaha! Right back atcha!
These look tasty!

Nahaha! I think I’ve figured out what makes
you tick, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s stay close from here on out, all right?

If you ever come visit Paldea to hang,
I’ll give you a tour!

Come use that strength of yours to knock the
socks off everyone in Paldea, yeah?
And guess what? My surprise isn’t over yet!
I actually ordered us a full-course meal!

Better get ready. After this feast, you won’t
be eating for a while!
